definition: an assault in which the assailant makes physical contact
details:
noun
- an assault in which the assailant makes physical contact
= synonyms: assault and battery
- the heavy fire of artillery to saturate an area rather than hit a specific target
= synonyms: barrage
- a device that produces electricity
= synonyms: electric battery
- a series of stamps operated in one mortar for crushing ores
= synonyms: stamp battery
- a collection of related things intended for use together
= example: a collection of related things intended for use together
- a unit composed of the pitcher and catcher
- group of guns or missile launchers operated together at one place
